document_data.caption: A map showing Warrior's Way and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Warrior's Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Warrior's Way''', which was also seen as '''Warriors' Way''', was a major road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Warrior's Way was located in [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]], spanning much of the ward. The road ran north to south, parallel with the [[Street of Silver]] to the west and the [[Street of the Sword]] to the east. Warrior's Way originated on [[Bazaar Street]] in the north, where it branched south to end on [[Waterdeep Way]]. Warrior's Way was intersected by [[Selduth Street]], [[Cymbril's Walk]], [[Lamp Street]], [[Buckle Alley]], and [[Palfrey Lane]].
